hibernate-mapping.query: select details from sail.beans.entity.BatWipMarkDetail details, sail.beans.entity.BatWipMark mark where mark.transferbill = ? and details.transferpid=mark.pid and mark.sysflag='1' and details.sysflag='1' order by mark.createtime desc
select mark from sail.beans.entity.BatWipMark mark where mark.transferbill = ? and mark.sysflag='1' order by mark.createtime desc
select mark from sail.beans.entity.BatWipMarkDetail mark where mark.sysflag='1' and mark.batchno = ? and mark.refbatchno = ? order by mark.createtime desc
